document_data.mainbody:
Cashew, or krail, was a fleshy nut produced by a tree of the same name.
Cashew soup was a dish prepared in the cities of Waterdeep and Ormpetarr in Sespech in the 15 century DR.
Cashews were sold by the pound through the famed Auroras Whole Realms Catalogue, priced at 20 gold pieces.
